languages.text: {n}Вы хватаетесь за рычаг — и по вашему телу проходит мощный разряд тока. Отдернув руку, вы наблюдаете, как рычаг раскаляется от напряжения, плавится и вязкой металлической жижей проваливается в собственный разъем.{/n}

{n}You grab the lever and a powerful electric discharge surges through your body. You jerk your hand away and watch the lever go red-hot from the voltage, melt into a viscous goop, and trickle down into its own socket.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы хватаетесь за рычаг — и по вашему телу проходит мощный разряд тока. Отдернув руку, вы наблюдаете, как рычаг раскаляется от напряжения, плавится и вязкой металлической жижей проваливается в собственный разъем.{/n}

{n}You grab the lever and a powerful electric discharge surges through your body. You jerk your hand away and watch the lever go red-hot from the voltage, melt into a viscous goop, and trickle down into its own socket.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你抓住电源拉杆的一瞬间，一股强大的电流涌入你的身体。你赶紧抽出了手。电源拉杆被烧得通红，融化成了一团粘稠的糊状物，堵住了拉杆的插座。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You grab the lever and a powerful electric discharge surges through your body. You jerk your hand away and watch the lever go red-hot from the voltage, melt into a viscous goop, and trickle down into its own socket.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你抓住电源拉杆的一瞬间，一股强大的电流涌入你的身体。你赶紧抽出了手。电源拉杆被烧得通红，融化成了一团粘稠的糊状物，堵住了拉杆的插座。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Agarras la palanca y una poderosa descarga eléctrica recorre tu cuerpo. Apartas la mano y ves cómo la palanca se pone al rojo vivo por la electricidad que la recorre, se funde en un limo viscoso y gotea por su propio hueco.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You grab the lever and a powerful electric discharge surges through your body. You jerk your hand away and watch the lever go red-hot from the voltage, melt into a viscous goop, and trickle down into its own socket.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Agarras la palanca y una poderosa descarga eléctrica recorre tu cuerpo. Apartas la mano y ves cómo la palanca se pone al rojo vivo por la electricidad que la recorre, se funde en un limo viscoso y gotea por su propio hueco.{/n}

languages.text: {n}レバーを握ると、激しい電力が全身を襲った。手をバッと離せば、レバーが電圧で真っ赤になり、溶けてねっとりした粘液と化して目の前でソケットにポタポタと落ちていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You grab the lever and a powerful electric discharge surges through your body. You jerk your hand away and watch the lever go red-hot from the voltage, melt into a viscous goop, and trickle down into its own socket.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}レバーを握ると、激しい電力が全身を襲った。手をバッと離せば、レバーが電圧で真っ赤になり、溶けてねっとりした粘液と化して目の前でソケットにポタポタと落ちていった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du packst den Hebel, und ein starker Stromschlag rast durch deinen Körper. Du ziehst deine Hand zurück und siehst zu, wie der Hebel glühendheiß wird, zu einer klebrigen Masse schmilzt und in seinen eigenen Socke hinuntertropft.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You grab the lever and a powerful electric discharge surges through your body. You jerk your hand away and watch the lever go red-hot from the voltage, melt into a viscous goop, and trickle down into its own socket.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du packst den Hebel, und ein starker Stromschlag rast durch deinen Körper. Du ziehst deine Hand zurück und siehst zu, wie der Hebel glühendheiß wird, zu einer klebrigen Masse schmilzt und in seinen eigenen Socke hinuntertropft.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Au moment où vous empoignez le levier, vous recevez une puissante décharge électrique qui parcourt tout votre corps. Vous retirez votre main juste avant que le levier ne vire au rouge puis fonde en une substance visqueuse qui s'écoule dans sa fente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You grab the lever and a powerful electric discharge surges through your body. You jerk your hand away and watch the lever go red-hot from the voltage, melt into a viscous goop, and trickle down into its own socket.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Au moment où vous empoignez le levier, vous recevez une puissante décharge électrique qui parcourt tout votre corps. Vous retirez votre main juste avant que le levier ne vire au rouge puis fonde en une substance visqueuse qui s'écoule dans sa fente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kolu kavradığın gibi güçlü bir elektrik akımı vücuduna hücum ediyor. Elini geri çekiyorsun. Sonrasında kol, yüksek voltaj yüzünden kıpkırmızı kesiliyor. Eriyip vıcık vıcık, yapışkan bir maddeye dönüşüp yuvasına doğru akıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You grab the lever and a powerful electric discharge surges through your body. You jerk your hand away and watch the lever go red-hot from the voltage, melt into a viscous goop, and trickle down into its own socket.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kolu kavradığın gibi güçlü bir elektrik akımı vücuduna hücum ediyor. Elini geri çekiyorsun ve kol, yüksek voltaj yüzünden kıpkırmızı kesiliyor. Eriyip vıcık vıcık, yapışkan bir maddeye dönüşüyor ve yuvasına doğru akıyor.{/n}
